LOADMAP(6D)                                         LOADMAP(6D)





NAME
       loadmap - loads the colormap from a file

SYNOPSIS
       loadmap file.map

DESCRIPTION
       loadmap loads the current contents of the color map from
       a file. The color indices and color map entries must  be
       in a file written by savemap(1G).

SEE ALSO
       makemap(1g), savemap(1g)



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004               LOADMAP(6D)
